de.polygonal.ds.Bits

type
class
Helper class for manipulating/querying single bit flags of a 31/32-bit integer.

Static Variables

ALL : Int

0xFFFFFFFF

BIT_01 : Int

1 << 00 (0x00000001)

BIT_02 : Int

1 << 01 (0x00000002)

BIT_03 : Int

1 << 02 (0x00000004)

BIT_04 : Int

1 << 03 (0x00000008)

BIT_05 : Int

1 << 04 (0x00000010)

BIT_06 : Int

1 << 05 (0x00000020)

BIT_07 : Int

1 << 06 (0x00000040)

BIT_08 : Int

1 << 07 (0x00000080)

BIT_09 : Int

1 << 08 (0x00000100)

BIT_10 : Int

1 << 09 (0x00000200)

BIT_11 : Int

1 << 10 (0x00000400)

BIT_12 : Int

1 << 11 (0x00000800)

BIT_13 : Int

1 << 12 (0x00001000)

BIT_14 : Int

1 << 13 (0x00002000)

BIT_15 : Int

1 << 14 (0x00004000)

BIT_16 : Int

1 << 15 (0x00008000)

BIT_17 : Int

1 << 16 (0x00010000)

1 << 17 (0x00020000)

1 << 18 (0x00040000)

1 << 19 (0x00080000)

1 << 20 (0x00100000)

Static Methods

clrBitAt(x : Int, p : Int) : Int

parameters
p The bit position in the range [1,32] (1=lsb).
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Position out of range (if debug flag is set).
Sets the bit in x at position p to 0.

clrBits(x : Int, bits : Int) : Int

Sets all bits in x to 0.

hasAllBits(x : Int, bits : Int) : Bool

Returns true if all bits in x are 1.

hasBitAt(x : Int, p : Int) : Bool

parameters
p The bit position in the range [1,32] (1=lsb).
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Position out of range (if debug flag is set).
Returns true the bit in x at position p is 1.

hasBits(x : Int, bits : Int) : Bool

Returns true if at least one bit of bits in x is 1.

invBitAt(x : Int, p : Int) : Int

parameters
p The bit position in the range [1,32] (1=lsb).
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Position out of range (if debug flag is set).
Flips the bit in x at position p.

invBits(x : Int, bits : Int) : Int

Flips all bits in x.

mask(n : Int) : Int

Constructs a mask of n bits.

msb(x : Int) : Int

The most significant bit.

nlz(x : Int) : Int

Counts the number of leading 0's, e.g. 16 (0x10 or 0b10000) has 27 leading 0's.

ntz(x : Int) : Int

Counts the number of trailing 0's, e.g. 16 (0x10 or 0b10000) has 4 trailing 0's.

ones(x : Int) : Int

Counts the number of '1'-bits, e.g. 00110111 has 5 bits set.

reverse(x : Int) : Int

Reverses x, e.g. b111000 becomes b000111.

setBitAt(x : Int, p : Int) : Int

parameters
p The bit position in the range [1,32] (1=lsb).
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Position out of range (if debug flag is set).
Sets the bit in x at position p to 1.

setBits(x : Int, bits : Int) : Int

Sets all bits in x to 1.

setBitsIf(x : Int, expr : Bool, bits : Int) : Int

Sets all bits in x to 1 if expr is true, otherwise to 0.

setBitsRange(x : Int, min : Int, max : Int) : Int

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError Invalid range (if debug flag is set).
Sets all bits to '1' in the range [min=1,max=32].
